last_episode_to_air.name: Bess-E / C'mon Get Happy!
last_episode_to_air.overview: Bessie believes she's a robot. / Bessie and Happy celebrate two years of friendship.

name: The Mighty B!
overview: The Mighty B! is an American animated television series co-created by Amy Poehler, Cynthia True and Erik Wiese for Nickelodeon. The series centers on Bessie Higgenbottom, an ambitious Honeybee girl scout who believes she will become The Mighty B if she collects every Honeybee badge. Bessie lives in San Francisco with her single mother Hilary, brother Ben and dog Happy. Poehler provides the voice of Bessie, who is loosely based on a character Poehler played on the improvisational comedy troupes Second City and Upright Citizens Brigade.

episodes.name: So Happy Together / Sweet Sixteenth
episodes.overview: Bessie finds a stray dog to enter into a Dog Show. / Bessie tries to get onto a roller coaster.

episodes.name: Bee My Baby / Bee Afraid
episodes.overview: Bessie and Penny babysit Gwen's little brothers. / The Honeybees go camping.

episodes.name: Artificial Unintelligence / We Got The Bee
episodes.overview: Bessie builds a Robot for the Science Fair. / Bessie tries to join a band.

episodes.name: Lil Orphan Happy / Body Rockers
episodes.overview: Bessie and Ben go looking for Happy's Mom. / The Honeybees go on a field trip to the Science Exploratorium.

episodes.name: Bat Mitzvah Crashers / Super Secret Weakness
episodes.overview: Bessie and Penny start crashing many Bat Mitzvahs. / Bessie searches for the Mighty B's weakness.

episodes.name: An I See Bee / Woodward and Beesting
episodes.overview: Bessie is convinced she can see the future. / Bessie tries to figure out Portia's secret.

episodes.name: Doppelfinger / Little Womyn
episodes.overview: After Finger is injured in an origami incident, his evil cousin Finguere shows up. / Bessie's Mom become the troop leader.

episodes.name: The Apprentice / Beenedict Arnold
episodes.overview: Mrs. Gibbons takes on Bessie as her apprentice. / Happy leaves Bessie for Portia.

episodes.name: Boston Beean / Penny Hearts Joey
episodes.overview: Bessie's pen pal comes to visit. / Penny takes home an animatronic kangaroo.

episodes.name: Ten Little Honeybees / Toot Toot
episodes.overview: Bessie plays detective to find Portia's locket. / Bessie gets ostracized from the Honeybees.

episodes.name: Night Howl / Hat Trick
episodes.overview: When Happy has almost no energy during the day, Bessie goes to find out why. / Bessie wants to use Happy in her magic act, but he sneaks away without her knowing.

episodes.name: Apoxalypse Now / Hive Jacked
episodes.overview: Bessie tries to get Chicken Pox from Gwen. / After losing a bet, Bessie gives her Hive to Portia and Gwen.

episodes.name: Name Shame / Something's Wrong with this Taffy
episodes.overview: Bessie has a secret middle name. / Bessie finds something wrong with the taffy.

episodes.name: Bee Patients / To Bee or Not to Bee
episodes.overview: Bessie and Happy go to the Doctor. / Bessie wins the chance to have tea with Miriam Breedlove.

episodes.name: Eye of the Honeybee / Thanksgiving Beenactment
episodes.overview: Penny finds her hidden talent of playing ping pong. / The Honeybees go on a trip to Colonial Farms and learn about pilgrim life.

episodes.name: Blindsided / Hen & Bappy
episodes.overview: Happy trades Bessie's glasses for a bone. / Ben and Happy switch bodies.

episodes.name: Ben Appetit / Dang it feels good to be a Gamester
episodes.overview: Bessie tries to learn about Ben's food trauma. / The Honeybees get addicted to a video game.

episodes.name: Portrait of a Happy / O Say Can Bess See
episodes.overview: Local photographer Fritz refuses  to take a picture of Happy. / Bessie has a difficult time looking for a hidden image in a frame.

episodes.name: Macro Mayhem / Ben Screams for Ice Cream
episodes.overview: Bessie finds a new hobby in macramé. / Bessie accidentally gets the ice cream man in trouble.

episodes.name: Dragonflies
episodes.overview: The Honeybees start a competition with the Dragonflies.

episodes.name: Catatonic
episodes.overview: Bessie gets a disappointing Halloween costume.

episodes.name: What's the Frequency Bessie? / Bee Nice
episodes.overview: Bessie's tooth filling conducts radio signals. / Bessie gets bad karma and tries to redeem herself.

episodes.name: Dirty Happy / Tour D' Alcatraz
episodes.overview: Happy refuses to take a bath. / Bessie and Happy go to Alcatraz and get mistaken for criminals.

episodes.name: Hairy Situation / Bee Plus One
episodes.overview: Bessie and Happy drink the Hippie's hair tonic by mistake. / Bessie wins tickets to a sold-out concert and everybody wants to be her plus one.

episodes.name: Bad to the Bee / Hive of Darkness
episodes.overview: Bessie feels that being good is pointless. / Bessie becomes a beekeeper.

episodes.name: Mr. Turtleton's Wild Ride / A Pirate's Life for B
episodes.overview: Bessie takes care of Millie's pet turtle. / Bessie and Happy find a gold nugget in their wall.

episodes.name: Awww-esome / Dogcatcher in the Rye
episodes.overview: Bessie keeps missing out on a video of puppies. / Bessie runs for City Dogcatcher.

episodes.name: Rinx! / Sleepless in San Francisco
episodes.overview: Bessie and Happy play a game of jinx. / Bessie sets out to prove that the boogeyman is not under Ben's bed.

episodes.name: Higgenbottom's 7 / Finger Pickin' Bad
episodes.overview: Bessie plans a heist to steal back one dollar. / When Finger makes a new friend, Bessie is forced to spend time with Ronnie.

episodes.name: It's B's Party / B-Chip
episodes.overview: Bessie is expecting a surprise party for her that nobody else has interest in. / Bessie takes Happy to get an identity chip.

episodes.name: Old Bee and the Sea / One Million Years Bee.C.
episodes.overview: Penny gets kidnapped by a mob of gangster fish while on a fishing trip. / Bessie and Happy go time travelling.

episodes.name: The Bone Identity / Grumpy Old Bees
episodes.overview: Happy receives a photo of his missing ear. / Bessie befriends an elderly ex-honeybee.

episodes.name: Children of the Unicorn / My Way or the Bee Way
episodes.overview: Bessie and Gwen try to prove Unicorns are real. / Bessie adopts a highway.

episodes.name: O Brother, What Art Thou? / Stuffed Happens
episodes.overview: Ben turns to the dark side when he thinks Bessie’s making Happy her sidekick instead of him. Later, Bessie gets framed for several crimes, and suspect number one is Mr. Pants the teddy bear.

episodes.name: Gorillas in the Midst
episodes.overview: Bessie disguises herself as a boy to join the Gorilla scouts.

episodes.name: Space Evaders / YiPs
episodes.overview: Happy launches himself and Bessie into outer space to avoid getting a flea dip. / Bessie and Happy go on a police ride-along.

episodes.name: Public Enembee / Bang the Drum Timely
episodes.overview: Bessie accidentally trips a fire alarm. / Bessie must write jokes in order to earn her Stand-up Comedy badge.

episodes.name: The League of Ordinary Gentlemen / Irritable Bowling Syndrome
episodes.overview: Ben, Happy and the Hippie form a Gentlemen's club and Bessie wants to join. / Bessie is haunted by her inability to get a strike while bowling.

episodes.name: Bess-E / C'mon Get Happy!
episodes.overview: Bessie believes she's a robot. / Bessie and Happy celebrate two years of friendship.
